Biography

AS A JUNIOR IN 2016: Appeared in 43 games with 37 starts at third base ... Went 3-for-3 with an RBI and a run scored against UC San Diego (May 8) … Drew three walks and hit a double against Cal Poly Pomona (March 11).

AS A SOPHOMORE IN 2015: Saw time in 29 games, with two starts at shortstop and batted .278 (5-for-18) … Eared three free passes against Grace (Feb. 22) and scored once … Went 1-for-2 with a double against La Sierra (Feb. 15) … Was 1-for-1 with an RBI double against Bethesda (March 7).

AS A FRESHMAN IN 2014: Appeared in 26 games with 10 starts at second base. Started 10 games … Hit .222 (2-for-9) with an RBI and a run scored … Went 1-for-2 with an RBI against Biola (Feb. 15).

HIGH SCHOOL: A 2013 graduate of St. Augustine High School in San Diego, Calif. ... Hit .305 his junior year ... Played travel ball for San Diego Gamers.

PERSONAL: Born October 31, 1994 in Encinitas, Calif. ... Son of Richard and Theresa Lemmel ... Has a younger brother, Cole ... Enjoys surfing and skateboarding ... Roots for the Miami Marlins, Miami Dolphins and San Diego Padres ... Favorite athlete is Jose Reyes ... Favorite movie is “Fight Club”... Greatest Influence is his father ... His most memorable moment is sweeping Cathedral City during his senior year … Likes most about CSUSM is the new facility on campus, The Sports Center … Majoring in Business Finance.

No stats available for the current season.
